name: Student Performance Factors
data_intro: This dataset provides a comprehensive overview of various factors affecting student performance in exams. It includes information on study habits, attendance, parental involvement, and other aspects influencing academic success.

cat_feature_intro.Parental_Involvement: | **Parental_Involvement**   | Level of parental involvement in the student's education (Low, Medium, High).    |
cat_feature_intro.Access_to_Resources: | **Access_to_Resources**    | Availability of educational resources (Low, Medium, High).                       |
cat_feature_intro.Motivation_Level: | **Motivation_Level**       | Student's level of motivation (Low, Medium, High).                               |
cat_feature_intro.Teacher_Quality: | **Teacher_Quality**        | Quality of the teachers (Low, Medium, High).                                     |
cat_feature_intro.Peer_Influence: | **Peer_Influence**         | Influence of peers on academic performance (Positive, Neutral, Negative).        |
cat_feature_intro.Parental_Education_Level: | **Parental_Education_Level** | Highest education level of parents (High School, College, Postgraduate).      |
cat_feature_intro.Distance_from_Home: | **Distance_from_Home**     | Distance from home to school (Near, Moderate, Far).                              |

num_feature_intro.Hours_Studied: | **Hours_Studied**          | Number of hours spent studying per week.                                         |
num_feature_intro.Sleep_Hours: | **Sleep_Hours**            | Average number of hours of sleep per night.                                      |
num_feature_intro.Tutoring_Sessions: | **Tutoring_Sessions**      | Number of tutoring sessions attended per month.                                  |
num_feature_intro.Physical_Activity: | **Physical_Activity**      | Average number of hours of physical activity per week.                           |
